posts.post_title: T206 CHRISTY MATHEWSON DARK CAP OLD MILL
posts.post_content:
Posted By: George
Off to ebay guys and gals, thanks for all the offers!! OLD MILL BACK Shows VERY nice for the grade. Fantastic centering.No creases. First to say I'll take it gets it. Since psa started labeling backs in 06' only 5 of 175 (or 3%) have this front/back combination.































Will accept paypal
